sentences.english: The footage has been watched more than 1.5m times on the popular Youku video sharing site.

sentences.english: Youku and Ku6 were both founded by former Sohu managers.

sentences.english: It has already attracted more visitors than Sohu.

definition: iQiyi, online video platform based in Beijing, launched in 2010
Sohu, Chinese web portal and online media company
online variety show (contracted form of 網絡綜藝節目|网络综艺节目)
satellite TV (abbr. for 衛星電視|卫星电视[wei4 xing1 dian4 shi4])
theater chain (abbr. for 電影院線|电影院线)
Baidu, Internet portal and search engine, www.baidu.com, listed as BIDU on NASDAQ since 1999
to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
TikTok, app for creating and sharing short videos
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
